name: Labrats (HeartBit)
description:
An small game made for GMTK Game jam from 2020 by the theme Out of control, create by me and my sister as our first jam

Kunny and Macky are two brothers that got themselfs in quite a problem, they accidentaly got trapped in a laboratory while playing and now they must escape, before they become the mad scientist's new test subjects.

why it fits  = You can't control what character you are using at the moment
